name: Staked HOPE
description: What is the project about? The HOPE Ecosystem, and its native stablecoin $HOPE, aim to provide frictionless and transparent next-gen financial infrastructures and services accessible to everyone. Offering new and existing crypto users alike a frictionless DeFi user experience, HOPE bridges traditional finance and centralized finance to create an all-in-one ecosystem of pioneering decentralized finance apps. What makes your project unique? - An all-in-one ecosystem of DeFi apps that runs on $HOPE, powered by $LT. - Bridging TradFi, CeFi, and DeFi with pioneering financial vehicles and cornerstone tools, HOPE aims to provide frictionless and transparent next-gen financial infrastructures and services accessible to everyone. - A distributed stablecoin designed for everyone, backed by crypto-native reserves. - Facilitating secure and borderless transactions with DeFi. History of your project. The HOPE team is primarily located in Singapore and Hong Kong, with key members having 10-15 years of successful entrepreneurial experience. Other key members and senior advisors come from internationally renowned institutions such as Goldman Sachs, JP Morgan, Tiger Global, Softbank, Accenture, PwC, Ernst&Young, Uber, Genesis Trading, and Baker McKenzie. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Rolling out new financial product for users to subscribe. What can your token be used for? Users who stake $HOPE will receive stHOPE. The HOPE Ecosystem runs on $HOPE, a distributed stablecoin backed by crypto-native reserves that offers various utilities for protocols within the HOPE Ecosystem.
